pr_title: Remote attach options are not only ports #2532

timeline.bodyText:
Please also update the corresponding help text in 
  
    
      graal/substratevm/src/com.oracle.svm.driver/resources/HelpExtra.txt
    
    
         Line 14
      in
      12cd99f
    
    
    
    

        
          
           --debug-attach[=<port>]
timeline.author: olpaw

timeline.message:
Remote attach options are not only ports #2532

* It can also be a combination of <host>:<port>,
and host can also be '*'.
* Let the JDK itself validate and throw the appropiate the error if needed.
* Avoids duplicating JDK validation code.
